item.title: PvP Zone
item.dc:creator: @RsMakerWoad RsMakerWoad
item.description:
@RsMakerWoad wrote:

[quote=“Lil_Smok3r, post:4, topic:458697”][quote author=segaxvi link=topic=561607.msg4096689#msg4096689 date=1346942454]

I got a Project Insanity server, I’m trying to add pvp outside edge bank this is what I’m doing:

This is in Player.java

public boolean isInEDGE() { if(absX >= 3090 && absX <= 3085 && absY >= 3488 && absY <= 3492) { return true; } return false; }

This one is in client.java

if(isInPVP() || isInEDGE()) { int modY = absY > 6400 ? absY - 6400 : absY; wildLevel = 12; headIconPk = 0; EarningPotential.checkPotential(this); getPA().walkableInterface(21300); getPA().showOption(3, 0, "Attack", 1); if(Config.SINGLE_AND_MULTI_ZONES) { if(inMulti()) { HighAndLow(); } else { HighAndLow(); } } else { getPA().multiWay(-1); HighAndLow();} } else if (isInPVPSafe()) { getPA().walkableInterface(21200); //getPA().showOption(3, 0, "Attack", 1); if(Config.SINGLE_AND_MULTI_ZONES) { if(inMulti()) { getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@Safe Zone", 21202); getPA().sendFrame126("@org@EP: "+ earningPotential+"%", 21303); } else { getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@Safe Zone", 21202); getPA().sendFrame126("@org@EP: "+ earningPotential+"%", 21303); } } else { getPA().multiWay(-1); getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@Safe Zone", 21202); getPA().sendFrame126("@org@EP: "+ earningPotential+"%", 21303); } } else if(inWild() && !isInPVP()) { int modY = absY > 6400 ? absY - 6400 : absY; wildLevel = (((modY - 3520) / 8) + 1); getPA().walkableInterface(197); if(Config.SINGLE_AND_MULTI_ZONES) { if(inMulti()) { getPA().sendFrame126("@yel@Level: "+wildLevel, 199); } else { getPA().sendFrame126("@yel@Level: "+wildLevel, 199); } } else { getPA().multiWay(-1); getPA().sendFrame126("@yel@Level: "+wildLevel, 199); } getPA().showOption(3, 0, "Attack", 1);

THESE ARE MY ERRORS PLEASE HELP GUYS.

src\server\model\players\Client.java:1183: ')' expected int modY = absY > 6400 ? absY - 6400 : absY; ^ src\server\model\players\Client.java:1198: illegal start of type } else if (isInPVPSafe()) { ^ src\server\model\players\Client.java:1198: ';' expected } else if (isInPVPSafe()) { ^ src\server\model\players\Client.java:1198: illegal start of type } else if (isInPVPSafe()) { ^ src\server\model\players\Client.java:1198: ';' expected } else if (isInPVPSafe()) { ^ src\server\model\players\Client.java:1214: illegal start of type } else if(inWild() && !isInPVP()) { ^ src\server\model\players\Client.java:1214: ';' expected } else if(inWild() && !isInPVP()) { ^ src\server\model\players\Client.java:1214: illegal start of type } else if(inWild() && !isInPVP()) { ^ src\server\model\players\Client.java:1214: ';' expected } else if(inWild() && !isInPVP()) { ^ 9 errors Press any key to continue . . .

You’ve done something seriosuly wrong or the compiler is fucked up.
[/quote]
Why The Fk do you tell everyone their compiler is f*ed up?!? Give Real Help!
OT: Read The Compiler Message, it can tell you what you need to fix…[/quote]
exactly what ii said dude,
he told somebody to create a teleport gfx by doing ::emote 2456 LIKE WTF

Read full topic

item.title: PvP Zone
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“segaxvi, post:2, topic:458697”][quote author=Joseph69 link=topic=561607.msg4096525#msg4096525 date=1346906423]
I got a Project Insanity server, I’m trying to add pvp outside edge bank this is what I’m doing:

This is in Player.java

public boolean isInEDGE() { if(absX >= 3090 && absX <= 3085 && absY >= 3488 && absY <= 3492) { return true; } return false; }

This one is in client.java

if(isInPVP() || isInEDGE()) { int modY = absY > 6400 ? absY - 6400 : absY; wildLevel = 12; headIconPk = 0; EarningPotential.checkPotential(this); getPA().walkableInterface(21300); getPA().showOption(3, 0, "Attack", 1); if(Config.SINGLE_AND_MULTI_ZONES) { if(inMulti()) { HighAndLow(); } else { HighAndLow(); } } else { getPA().multiWay(-1); HighAndLow();} } else if (isInPVPSafe()) { getPA().walkableInterface(21200); //getPA().showOption(3, 0, "Attack", 1); if(Config.SINGLE_AND_MULTI_ZONES) { if(inMulti()) { getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@Safe Zone", 21202); getPA().sendFrame126("@org@EP: "+ earningPotential+"%", 21303); } else { getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@Safe Zone", 21202); getPA().sendFrame126("@org@EP: "+ earningPotential+"%", 21303); } } else { getPA().multiWay(-1); getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@Safe Zone", 21202); getPA().sendFrame126("@org@EP: "+ earningPotential+"%", 21303); } } else if(inWild() && !isInPVP()) { int modY = absY > 6400 ? absY - 6400 : absY; wildLevel = (((modY - 3520) / 8) + 1); getPA().walkableInterface(197); if(Config.SINGLE_AND_MULTI_ZONES) { if(inMulti()) { getPA().sendFrame126("@yel@Level: "+wildLevel, 199); } else { getPA().sendFrame126("@yel@Level: "+wildLevel, 199); } } else { getPA().multiWay(-1); getPA().sendFrame126("@yel@Level: "+wildLevel, 199); } getPA().showOption(3, 0, "Attack", 1);

THESE ARE MY ERRORS PLEASE HELP GUYS.

src\server\model\players\Client.java:1183: ')' expected int modY = absY > 6400 ? absY - 6400 : absY; ^ src\server\model\players\Client.java:1198: illegal start of type } else if (isInPVPSafe()) { ^ src\server\model\players\Client.java:1198: ';' expected } else if (isInPVPSafe()) { ^ src\server\model\players\Client.java:1198: illegal start of type } else if (isInPVPSafe()) { ^ src\server\model\players\Client.java:1198: ';' expected } else if (isInPVPSafe()) { ^ src\server\model\players\Client.java:1214: illegal start of type } else if(inWild() && !isInPVP()) { ^ src\server\model\players\Client.java:1214: ';' expected } else if(inWild() && !isInPVP()) { ^ src\server\model\players\Client.java:1214: illegal start of type } else if(inWild() && !isInPVP()) { ^ src\server\model\players\Client.java:1214: ';' expected } else if(inWild() && !isInPVP()) { ^ 9 errors Press any key to continue . . .
[/quote]

You’ve done something seriosuly wrong or the compiler is fucked up.[/quote]
Why The Fk do you tell everyone their compiler is f*ed up?!? Give Real Help!
OT: Read The Compiler Message, it can tell you what you need to fix…

Read full topic

item.title: PvP Zone
item.dc:creator: @RsMakerWoad RsMakerWoad
item.description:
@RsMakerWoad wrote:

[/quote]

You’ve done something seriosuly wrong or the compiler is fucked up.
[/quote]
Dude stfu you aint talking sense dude lmfao you tell everyone there compiler is fucked
Btw dude,i cant find a problem since my server is the same as that code:P other than that try doing it like

f(isInPVP() || isInEDGE()) { int modY = absY > 6400 ? absY - 6400 : absY; wildLevel = 25; headIconPk = 0; EarningPotential.checkPotential(this); getPA().walkableInterface(21300); getPA().showOption(3, 0, "Attack", 1); if(Config.SINGLE_AND_MULTI_ZONES) { if(inMulti()) { HighAndLow(); } else { HighAndLow(); } } else { getPA().multiWay(-1); HighAndLow();} } else if (isInPVPSafe()) { getPA().walkableInterface(21200); //getPA().showOption(3, 0, "Attack", 1); if(Config.SINGLE_AND_MULTI_ZONES) { if(inMulti()) { getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@Safe Zone", 21202); getPA().sendFrame126("@org@EP: "+ earningPotential+"%", 21303); } else { getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@Safe Zone", 21202); getPA().sendFrame126("@org@EP: "+ earningPotential+"%", 21303); } } else { getPA().multiWay(-1); getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@Safe Zone", 21202); getPA().sendFrame126("@org@EP: "+ earningPotential+"%", 21303); } } else if(inWild() && !isInPVP()) { int modY = absY > 6400 ? absY - 6400 : absY; wildLevel = (((modY - 3520) / 8) + 1); getPA().walkableInterface(197); if(Config.SINGLE_AND_MULTI_ZONES) { if(inMulti()) { getPA().sendFrame126("@yel@Level: "+wildLevel, 199); } else { getPA().sendFrame126("@yel@Level: "+wildLevel, 199); } } else { getPA().multiWay(-1); getPA().sendFrame126("@yel@Level: "+wildLevel, 199); } getPA().showOption(3, 0, "Attack", 1);

Read full topic

item.title: PvP Zone
item.dc:creator: @segaxvi segaxvi
item.description:
@segaxvi wrote:

[quote=“Joseph69, post:1, topic:458697”]I got a Project Insanity server, I’m trying to add pvp outside edge bank this is what I’m doing:

This is in Player.java

public boolean isInEDGE() { if(absX >= 3090 && absX <= 3085 && absY >= 3488 && absY <= 3492) { return true; } return false; }

This one is in client.java

if(isInPVP() || isInEDGE()) { int modY = absY > 6400 ? absY - 6400 : absY; wildLevel = 12; headIconPk = 0; EarningPotential.checkPotential(this); getPA().walkableInterface(21300); getPA().showOption(3, 0, "Attack", 1); if(Config.SINGLE_AND_MULTI_ZONES) { if(inMulti()) { HighAndLow(); } else { HighAndLow(); } } else { getPA().multiWay(-1); HighAndLow();} } else if (isInPVPSafe()) { getPA().walkableInterface(21200); //getPA().showOption(3, 0, "Attack", 1); if(Config.SINGLE_AND_MULTI_ZONES) { if(inMulti()) { getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@Safe Zone", 21202); getPA().sendFrame126("@org@EP: "+ earningPotential+"%", 21303); } else { getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@Safe Zone", 21202); getPA().sendFrame126("@org@EP: "+ earningPotential+"%", 21303); } } else { getPA().multiWay(-1); getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@Safe Zone", 21202); getPA().sendFrame126("@org@EP: "+ earningPotential+"%", 21303); } } else if(inWild() && !isInPVP()) { int modY = absY > 6400 ? absY - 6400 : absY; wildLevel = (((modY - 3520) / 8) + 1); getPA().walkableInterface(197); if(Config.SINGLE_AND_MULTI_ZONES) { if(inMulti()) { getPA().sendFrame126("@yel@Level: "+wildLevel, 199); } else { getPA().sendFrame126("@yel@Level: "+wildLevel, 199); } } else { getPA().multiWay(-1); getPA().sendFrame126("@yel@Level: "+wildLevel, 199); } getPA().showOption(3, 0, "Attack", 1);

THESE ARE MY ERRORS PLEASE HELP GUYS.

src\server\model\players\Client.java:1183: ')' expected int modY = absY > 6400 ? absY - 6400 : absY; ^ src\server\model\players\Client.java:1198: illegal start of type } else if (isInPVPSafe()) { ^ src\server\model\players\Client.java:1198: ';' expected } else if (isInPVPSafe()) { ^ src\server\model\players\Client.java:1198: illegal start of type } else if (isInPVPSafe()) { ^ src\server\model\players\Client.java:1198: ';' expected } else if (isInPVPSafe()) { ^ src\server\model\players\Client.java:1214: illegal start of type } else if(inWild() && !isInPVP()) { ^ src\server\model\players\Client.java:1214: ';' expected } else if(inWild() && !isInPVP()) { ^ src\server\model\players\Client.java:1214: illegal start of type } else if(inWild() && !isInPVP()) { ^ src\server\model\players\Client.java:1214: ';' expected } else if(inWild() && !isInPVP()) { ^ 9 errors Press any key to continue . . .[/quote]

You’ve done something seriosuly wrong or the compiler is fucked up.

item.title: PvP Zone
item.dc:creator: @Joseph69 Joseph69
item.description:

I got a Project Insanity server, I’m trying to add pvp outside edge bank this is what I’m doing:

This is in Player.java

public boolean isInEDGE() { if(absX >= 3090 && absX <= 3085 && absY >= 3488 && absY <= 3492) { return true; } return false; }

This one is in client.java

if(isInPVP() || isInEDGE()) { int modY = absY > 6400 ? absY - 6400 : absY; wildLevel = 12; headIconPk = 0; EarningPotential.checkPotential(this); getPA().walkableInterface(21300); getPA().showOption(3, 0, "Attack", 1); if(Config.SINGLE_AND_MULTI_ZONES) { if(inMulti()) { HighAndLow(); } else { HighAndLow(); } } else { getPA().multiWay(-1); HighAndLow();} } else if (isInPVPSafe()) { getPA().walkableInterface(21200); //getPA().showOption(3, 0, "Attack", 1); if(Config.SINGLE_AND_MULTI_ZONES) { if(inMulti()) { getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@Safe Zone", 21202); getPA().sendFrame126("@org@EP: "+ earningPotential+"%", 21303); } else { getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@Safe Zone", 21202); getPA().sendFrame126("@org@EP: "+ earningPotential+"%", 21303); } } else { getPA().multiWay(-1); getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@Safe Zone", 21202); getPA().sendFrame126("@org@EP: "+ earningPotential+"%", 21303); } } else if(inWild() && !isInPVP()) { int modY = absY > 6400 ? absY - 6400 : absY; wildLevel = (((modY - 3520) / 8) + 1); getPA().walkableInterface(197); if(Config.SINGLE_AND_MULTI_ZONES) { if(inMulti()) { getPA().sendFrame126("@yel@Level: "+wildLevel, 199); } else { getPA().sendFrame126("@yel@Level: "+wildLevel, 199); } } else { getPA().multiWay(-1); getPA().sendFrame126("@yel@Level: "+wildLevel, 199); } getPA().showOption(3, 0, "Attack", 1);

src\server\model\players\Client.java:1183: ')' expected int modY = absY > 6400 ? absY - 6400 : absY; ^ src\server\model\players\Client.java:1198: illegal start of type } else if (isInPVPSafe()) { ^ src\server\model\players\Client.java:1198: ';' expected } else if (isInPVPSafe()) { ^ src\server\model\players\Client.java:1198: illegal start of type } else if (isInPVPSafe()) { ^ src\server\model\players\Client.java:1198: ';' expected } else if (isInPVPSafe()) { ^ src\server\model\players\Client.java:1214: illegal start of type } else if(inWild() && !isInPVP()) { ^ src\server\model\players\Client.java:1214: ';' expected } else if(inWild() && !isInPVP()) { ^ src\server\model\players\Client.java:1214: illegal start of type } else if(inWild() && !isInPVP()) { ^ src\server\model\players\Client.java:1214: ';' expected } else if(inWild() && !isInPVP()) { ^ 9 errors Press any key to continue . . .
